name: Pulao
description: A special type of steamed rice served with many kinds of soup, vegetables and meat.

name: Ghundruk & Dhido Combo
description: Typical Nepalese snack,dried leaf vegetables, claiming to be one among the national dishes

name: Pani Puri
description: Panipuri, phuchka, gupchup, golgappa, or pani ke patashe is a type of snack originating in the Indian subcontinent, common street food.
